title: Secure Coding and Threat Managment
desc: Adopting a secure coding standard and integrating security into the development process from the start are crucial in mitigating vulnerabilities and reducing security breaches. This includes following established standards like OWASP Top 10 or CERT Secure Coding Standards, implementing zero trust principles, evaluating risks, and establishing comprehensive security policies, along with conducting employee training and awareness programs to ensure compliance and understanding.
